name: gzsubrg

body.origin:
|- wcel(cgz, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld))
-| wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cgz), wcel(cv(hs0), cc))
-| wi(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cgz), wcel(cv(hs1), cgz)), wcel(co(cv(hs0), caddc, cv(hs1)), cgz))
-| wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cgz), wcel(cneg(cv(hs0)), cgz))
-| wcel(nat1, cgz)
-| wi(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cgz), wcel(cv(hs1), cgz)), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs1)), cgz))
-| diffss(hs0, hs1)
-| diffsc(hs0, cgz)
-| diffsc(hs1, cgz)
body.pretty:
⊢ Z[i]∈(SubRing ` CCfld)
⊣ (hs0 ∈ Z[i]→ hs0 ∈ ℂ)
⊣ ((hs0 ∈ Z[i]∧ hs1 ∈ Z[i])→(hs0[+]hs1)∈ Z[i])
⊣ (hs0 ∈ Z[i]→ -u(hs0)∈ Z[i])
⊣ 1 ∈ Z[i]
⊣ ((hs0 ∈ Z[i]∧ hs1 ∈ Z[i])→(hs0[×]hs1)∈ Z[i])
⊣ d(hs0, hs1)
⊣ d(hs0, Z[i])
⊣ d(hs1, Z[i])
